p: The triplet regimen of weekly ixazomib‐Rd administered in 28‐day cycles has also been investigated in NDMM (NCT01217957); the overall response rate (ORR) was high (92%), with 58% of patients achieving at least a very good partial response (VGPR). Responses deepened with an increasing number of treatment cycles, and the combination was well tolerated (Kumar et al, 2014b). Data from this study also showed the feasibility of long‐term maintenance treatment with single‐agent ixazomib (Kumar et al, 2014c). A parallel study has investigated ixazomib‐Rd in NDMM patients but using a twice‐weekly ixazomib dosing schedule; here, we report the findings from this study (NCT01383928) after a median follow‐up of almost 4 years.
